column2: Ashray Akruti is looking for Speech Therapist Job description: Speech Therapist Responsibilities: Assessing, diagnosing, screening, and preventing language, speech, and swallowing disorders. Communicating with the patient, and liaising with their family members, physicians, and teachers to design effective treatment plans. Using tried and tested therapies in combination with new, innovative techniques to provide the best care. Keeping up-to-date with advancements in the field by attending conferences, conducting research, and expanding professional and academic networks. Educating patients and their families on speech disorders and available therapies. Taking detailed notes on patient history and progress. Providing mentoring and workshops to speech therapy students. Evaluating patient progress and implementing changes to therapy programs as required. Speech Therapist Requirements: Bachelor / Master's degree in speech therapy or speech-language pathology. Relevant license and certification. Experience with certain disorders and age groups may be required. Sound understanding of speech-related disorders and treatments. Job Type: Full time and Work From Office. Looking for immediate joining Working Hours: - 9 am to 6 PM Work Location: - Manikonda Interested Candidate please call Ms. Pavithra or Mail us to pavithra.p@ashrayakruti.in and hr@ashrayakruti.in Contact number:- 9281029067

column1: Hiring For Chief Of Lab/Consultant Pathologist
column2: Job Title/Designation:  Consultant Pathologist/Chief Of Lab  Location:  Basti, Faizabad and Lakhimpur   Employment Type:  Full Time/Part time   Job responsibility:   To take charge as Technical and Administrative head of  Lab.   You shall look after the various technical aspects of the laboratory, such as timely calibration of the various instruments installed, running of the controls to ensure accurate results of the samples tested, daily maintenance of the machines for which the concerned engineer are to be contacted on need basis.  You shall strictly monitor Quality control of all tests conducted.  Ensure accurate testing, validation, timely release of reports, and efficient inventory control.  Providing guidance to the Technicians and other staff members of Lab.  Keeping the cost of operation of the lab, under budgeted limits.  Preparing the lab for QA audits or any audits as applicable.  Attend and present CMEs    Education:  MD PATHOLOGY / DNB /DCP  Please share your resume on  aayushi.verma@lalpathlabs.com or Whatsapp-9760058388.

column2: Job Description Excellent Career Opportunity for the experienced Lab Services professional to work on a leadership role for Top-Notch and one of the fastest growing organization in the Diagnostic Industry Job Description: The Director  Lab Services shall be responsible for following job description but not limited to;  Administration :  1. Provide effective and efficient administration of the medical laboratory services of the central laboratory and all the satellite centers. Satellite Centers are monitored through onsite visits at periodic intervals.  2. To delegate duties to the Clinical Consultants, Laboratory in charges, General Supervisor (Quality Manager), Senior Manager Technical operations, Technical Consultant (Section Heads of the respective sections) in Central as well as Satellite Centers.  3. Ensure that there are sufficient qualified personnel with adequate training and experience to meet the needs of the laboratory.  4. To relate and function effectively with applicable accreditation agencies (NABL, ISO 9001), regulatory agencies, top management, healthcare community, and the patient population served as a member of medical staff.  5. To plan, set goals, develop and allocate adequate, appropriate resources in consultation with the Top management for budgetary allocations.  6. To discuss user specification with Top management for selection of equipment, methods and reagents appropriate to the needs of patients, and the scope of testing.  7. Authorized to select and monitor the referral laboratories in coordination with Quality Manager and Section Heads  8. Address and review the complaints, suggestions or feedback from users of laboratory services along with QAD.  9. To implement a contingency plan to ensure that essential services are available during emergency situations and other conditions when laboratory services are limited or unavailable.  10. Ensure good staff morale  11. Regular travel to all the Processing Units (As defined)  12. To motivate internal Doctors for Publications & Papers.  13. To ensure that periodic CMEs are being organized.  14. To maintain cordial relations with our external consultants and visit them regularly.  Technical:  1. Ensure that appropriate services are provided to meet the needs of the users of the laboratory by the appointed Consultants (Pathology, Microbiology, Biochemistry, Cytogenetics etc.) and designate Section Heads as appropriate.  2. Provide advisory services for those requesting information about the choice of tests and the use of the services and the interpretation of laboratory data.  3. To ensure adequate method verifications and approval of new test methods/ equipment performance verifications as per the procedures to determine the reliability of the procedures to meet needs of the user.  4. Approve new/amendments to report formats in coordination with Section Heads/Consultants  5. Monitor the work performed in the laboratory in coordination with Section heads/ Consultants to determine that medically reliable data are being generated.  6. Serve as an active member of the medicalstaff for the facilities served  7. Provide educational programs for the medical and laboratory staff and participate in such programs of the institution.  8. Review PT/ILC periodically along with the respective Section Head/Consultants and ensure corrective / preventive action plans are followed when results are not satisfactory.  9. Review quality indicator data, EQAS / PT results and monthly CV%  10. To plan and direct research and development appropriate to the facility.  11. Work towards making the Lab as a Centre of Excellence  12. To track inventory of non-moving Tests and New Introductory Tests and orient/ train the Sales Team accordingly.  Phlebotomy:  1. Overall supervision of the Phlebotomy group  2. To ensure quality of service and training  3. Should own up the responsibility of customer experience and satisfaction across the group by visiting all centers on a regular basis and ensuring to identify and address issues in an effective and efficient manner  Reporting:  1. Authorized to report results of Haematology, Immunohematology, Clinical Pathology, Histopathology Cytopathology, Biochemistry, and Molecular Pathology including FISH  2. Guide / discuss difficult cases in Haematology, Histopathology Clinical Pathology, Cytopathology, and Molecular Pathology including FISH with the respective Section heads/Consultants  LIS Authorities and responsibilities:  3. Make amendments (comments, interpretations) and Authenticate reports  4. View pending sample status and Audit trail Safety:  1. Implement a safe laboratory environment in compliance with good practices and applicable regulations.  2. Follow standard and universal precautions including PPE and Biomedical waste management guidelines when relevant 3. Ensure active vaccination status Quality management system:  1. Define, implement and monitor standards of the established QMS including Quality Policy in coordination with the Quality Assurance Department / Quality Manager of all centers. This also includes cost effectiveness of the pathology and Clinical Laboratory services provided for patient care.  2. Authorized to prepare Quality Manual, review Management System Procedures and to approve technical SOPs.  3. Establish and implementation of good record keeping maintenance system in the laboratory in coordination with the QAD  4. To perform any additional duty delegated by the Management deemed fit for the overall improvement of the organizations services.   Candidate profile requirements Should be from an Ivy League institution.  Should have an experience of 12  15 Years ?? Should be an NABL assessor ?? Should possess good administration and operational skills ?? Should be good at people management ?? Should possess sound knowledge of Quality Management System Interested please share your profile on 8707201673 or shaini.gupta@quadrangle.in
column11: Pathology, ILC, PT, Lab

column2: We are looking for Consultant Pathologist for our Lab in Shimla   Role & responsibilities   Performing specimen analysis by using laboratory tools and equipment, in order to study samples and perform tests to accurately analyze bodily fluids and tissue specimens. Looking for abnormalities in samples that evidence disease and conveying this information to the relevant medical practitioner. Using checklists, medical software, and retesting to get thorough and precise results. Writing pathology reports detailing specimens tested, results of tests, and the final diagnosis. Ensuring meeting the caseload and turnaround time expectations of diagnostic tests during regular working hours. Telephonic consultations with clinicians regarding interpretation of laboratory data and other laboratory-related clinical issues, during routine hours Overseeing the installation, testing, calibration, operation and maintenance of new equipment Conducting interviews and hiring of health care staff including medical laboratory technologists and phlebotomist in conjunction with Human Resources department and support personnel along with planning for future staffing in the laboratory. Coordination and maintenance of laboratory safety procedures including biomedical and chemical waste management. Preferred candidate profile   MBBS, MD -Pathology

column2: Perform microscopic examination of tissue samples, blood smears, and other specimens to diagnose diseases, including cancer, infections, and autoimmune disorders.        Interpret laboratory test results, including immunohistochemistry, molecular diagnostics, and cytogenetics, to provide accurate and timely diagnoses.      Collaborate with surgeons, oncologists, radiologists, and other healthcare providers to develop treatment plans and monitor patients' progress.      Participate in multidisciplinary case conferences, tumor boards, and quality improvement initiatives to enhance patient care and outcomes.      Provide consultations to healthcare providers regarding test selection, specimen collection, and interpretation of test results.      Maintain accurate and up-to-date medical records, including pathology reports, diagnostic findings, and patient information, using electronic health record (EHR) systems.

column2: Deliver all clinical audiology services in Amplifon clinics - audiology diagnostics to hearing aid fitting and verification.        Job Specification:          Strong and effective communicator.      Ability to build trust, value others and demonstrate high integrity.      Team dynamics is essential; an individual should have the attitude to work seamlessly within in-house team of CSO and Audiologist.      Demonstrable ability to operate all audiometric equipment      Demonstrable ability to administer all diagnostic audiological tests for adults and children and also to interpret the results.      Demonstrable ability to subjectively calibrate audiometer and necessary calibration for impedance meter.      Working knowledge of the pathology of all hearing and related speech disorders.      Demonstrable ability to counsel adults with hearing loss using various methods in client-centered approach      Good working knowledge on current and past hearing aid and assistive devices technology      Demonstrable ability to fit and verify hearing aids and assistive devices to adults with hearing loss      Demonstrable ability to maintain records, prepare reports and conduct correspondence related to work.      Ability to maintain favorable relations with doctors, customers and all internal stake holders.      Willingness and ability to work in different teams in field and head office and show high level of accountability with each and every customer      Ability to learn and improvise clinical work as per the inputs provided/ shared      Ability to align with organization s objectives and accept the goals designed time to time as per the need of the organization      Knowledge of HA dispensing is essential and should be able to handle high level of footfall at the clinical setup.

column2: We are seeking a highly motivated and experienced Senior Lecturer to join our Department of Pathology. The successful candidate will be responsible for teaching and conducting research in pathology, as well as providing clinical services to patients.           Responsibilities:         Teach undergraduate and postgraduate students in the field of pathology.     Develop and deliver high-quality course material, including lectures, tutorials, and practical sessions.     Conduct research in the field of pathology and contribute to the colleges research program.     Provide clinical services in the area of pathology, including diagnostic services and consultation.     Contribute to the development and delivery of the colleges pathology programs.     Participate in the academic and administrative activities of the department and the college.             Qualifications:         A postgraduate degree(M.D.S) in pathology or a related field.     At least 5 years of experience in teaching and research in the field of pathology.     A track record of research publications in high-quality journals.     Experience in providing clinical services in the area of pathology.     Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.     Ability to work independently and as part of a team.             Eligible Fields:         Pathology     Anatomic Pathology     Clinical Pathology     Hematopathology     Molecular Pathology     Surgical Pathology     Forensic Pathology     Neuropathology         Note:               Salary for all positions will be based on qualification and experience and will not be a limiting factor for the right candidate.
column11: Pathology, Administration, Interpersonal skills, Surgical, Diagnostics, Health care services, Forensic, Research, Clinical pathology, Teaching
